title: 45 Undeniably Luxurious Gifts for Women Who Appreciate the Finer Things
description: From a Kendall Jenner-approved Tory Burch perfume to a pair of fancy Prada socks.
excerpt: Looking to gift something special to the women in your life? There are several luxury gifts for her at every price point. Read on for the best finds of 2024.
text: La Mer The Lip Polish ExfoliatorWhat better way to pucker up than with a cream of the crop exfoliator by La Mer. One reviewer says, "I regret not purchasing this polish sooner. It leaves my lips so soft and smooth, has a nice minty feel, and I love the applicator. Very effective at removing dead skin and plumping fine lines for a beautiful finish. Do not be deterred by the price tag, this outperforms other scrubs by a mile.”Mateo Pearl Curl 14kt Gold EarringsGood things come in small packages, especially when they are from the celebrated jewelry brand Mateo. Here, the label turns freshwater pearls into a work of art with sculptural gold accents.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMiu Miu Leather diaryIt’s important to have a place to write down all of her goals and thoughts. Miu Miu makes the journaling process extra special with this leather-trimmed notebook.Lisa Yang Kai Cashmere PonchoHere’s an elegant wrap made with 100% cashmere that will take her from winter to spring with ease. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowDiptyque Baies and Roses Duo Classic CandlesFor a limited time, Diptyque’s most-beloved scents are getting a makeover with red and pink-tinted glass vessels and heart-shaped borders.Tory Burch Sublime Eau de ParfumHere’s a magical scent that has mastered the art of mixing floral notes in a fresh way. Rose and magnolia combine with the hypnotizing smell of osmanthus at the heart of this perfume, making it a universally flattering gift for anyone. And do you see that gorgeous case? There’s no need for gift wrapping with packaging this divine.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFendi Apres Chic BootsThere’s nothing more luxurious than a pair of shearling boots, especially when they are trimmed in Fendi’s iconic logo.KitchenAid Design Series Evergreen Stand MixerIf she has dreams of getting her Nara Smith on, this limited-edition version of KitchenAid’s tried-and-true mixer will inspire her to bring all of those saved Pinterest recipes to life. In addition to the walnut bowl and green mixing stand, this special present comes with a wire whip, dough hook, and flat beater to make baking easier than ever.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowValentino Garavani VLogo Signature Small Jacquard PouchWhether she’s a jet setter or simply needs help staying organized, Valentino’s pouch is the luxurious holder she needs. This one features a jacquard floral print revived by new creative director Alessandro Michele.Alaïa Le Coeur Crossbody BagShe’ll gladly wear her hear on her sleeve (or should I say shoulder), especially if its this viral Alaïa bag.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowCoach Tabby Bag CharmWhether she’s attaching this to her keys or if she’s lucky enough to have Coach’s most coveted bag to attach it to, this charm is proof that good things come in small packages. If gold feels like too much, this one also comes in a sophisticated silver.Chanel Chance Perfumed Hand CreamsHere’s a gift that’s both luxurious and useful. During the winter, help her skin stay hydrated with Chanel’s magical little hand creams. This set comes with three pastel-colored tubes, so she can keep one ready to go in each purse.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowKurt Geiger Small Bond Top Handle BagThis sparkling bag will be the hero of her collection. Gucci’s design is made from 100 percent silk and comes with an enchanting floral print that’s emblazoned with the brand’s name.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPrada Women’s Velvet Hair Clip - BlackOut of all of the luxury hair accessories, I’d bet Prada’s offerings top her list. And with the ever-increasing popularity of bows, this velvet one with the iconic triangle logo is a dream come true in any collection.Altuzarra Barnum WoolThere’s nothing as synonymous with the season as a Fair Isle sweater. Altuzarra is the brand behind this season’s editor-approved design, thanks to a luxurious blend of alpaca wool and cashmere yarn.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowDolce & Gabbana Gemstone Eyeshadow PaletteAdd a sophisticated touch of sparkle to her makeup kit with Dolce & Gabbana’s limited-edition palette, which features four shadows perfect for mixing and matching.Chanel N°5 1.7 fl. oz. Eau de Parfum Body Oil SetWhen in doubt, stick to the classics. Chanel’s signature fragrance will forever be a crowd-pleaser. This set includes the perfume as well as the exquisite body oil, so she can double the fragrance’s impact and get the look (and feel) of super hydrated skin.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSaint Laurent Le 5 à 7 Bea Suede Tote BagIs it possible for a handbag to be trendy and classic at the same time? Yes. Case in point: this Saint Laurent tote. The timeless silhouette is something she can carry to the office or through the airport. Plus, the brown suede material checks the trendy box.Flamingo Estate The Mini Garden TourWhen it comes to high-quality gifts for every woman on your list, bookmark Flamingo Estate. This set comes with a little bit of everything, from the slowly harvested olive oil to the soap created with sustainable botanicals.
html:
La Mer The Lip Polish Exfoliator

What better way to pucker up than with a cream of the crop exfoliator by La Mer. One reviewer says, "I regret not purchasing this polish sooner. It leaves my lips so soft and smooth, has a nice minty feel, and I love the applicator. Very effective at removing dead skin and plumping fine lines for a beautiful finish. Do not be deterred by the price tag, this outperforms other scrubs by a mile.”

Mateo Pearl Curl 14kt Gold Earrings

Good things come in small packages, especially when they are from the celebrated jewelry brand Mateo. Here, the label turns freshwater pearls into a work of art with sculptural gold accents.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Miu Miu Leather diary

It’s important to have a place to write down all of her goals and thoughts. Miu Miu makes the journaling process extra special with this leather-trimmed notebook.

Lisa Yang Kai Cashmere Poncho

Here’s an elegant wrap made with 100% cashmere that will take her from winter to spring with ease.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Diptyque Baies and Roses Duo Classic Candles

For a limited time, Diptyque’s most-beloved scents are getting a makeover with red and pink-tinted glass vessels and heart-shaped borders.

Tory Burch Sublime Eau de Parfum

Here’s a magical scent that has mastered the art of mixing floral notes in a fresh way. Rose and magnolia combine with the hypnotizing smell of osmanthus at the heart of this perfume, making it a universally flattering gift for anyone. And do you see that gorgeous case? There’s no need for gift wrapping with packaging this divine.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Fendi Apres Chic Boots

There’s nothing more luxurious than a pair of shearling boots, especially when they are trimmed in Fendi’s iconic logo.

KitchenAid Design Series Evergreen Stand Mixer

If she has dreams of getting her Nara Smith on, this limited-edition version of KitchenAid’s tried-and-true mixer will inspire her to bring all of those saved Pinterest recipes to life. In addition to the walnut bowl and green mixing stand, this special present comes with a wire whip, dough hook, and flat beater to make baking easier than ever.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Valentino Garavani VLogo Signature Small Jacquard Pouch

Whether she’s a jet setter or simply needs help staying organized, Valentino’s pouch is the luxurious holder she needs. This one features a jacquard floral print revived by new creative director Alessandro Michele.

Alaïa Le Coeur Crossbody Bag

She’ll gladly wear her hear on her sleeve (or should I say shoulder), especially if its this viral Alaïa bag.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Coach Tabby Bag Charm

Whether she’s attaching this to her keys or if she’s lucky enough to have Coach’s most coveted bag to attach it to, this charm is proof that good things come in small packages. If gold feels like too much, this one also comes in a sophisticated silver.

Chanel Chance Perfumed Hand Creams

Here’s a gift that’s both luxurious and useful. During the winter, help her skin stay hydrated with Chanel’s magical little hand creams. This set comes with three pastel-colored tubes, so she can keep one ready to go in each purse.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Kurt Geiger Small Bond Top Handle Bag

This sparkling bag will be the hero of her collection. She can wear it to fancy events with her favorite dress or use it to elevate a casual denim-and-white-T-shirt look.

Gucci GG Shadow Silk Scarf

If she’s hard to please, take your gift-giving skills to new heights with an elegant scarf. Gucci’s design is made from 100 percent silk and comes with an enchanting floral print that’s emblazoned with the brand’s name.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Prada Women’s Velvet Hair Clip - Black

Out of all of the luxury hair accessories, I’d bet Prada’s offerings top her list. And with the ever-increasing popularity of bows, this velvet one with the iconic triangle logo is a dream come true in any collection.

Altuzarra Barnum Wool

There’s nothing as synonymous with the season as a Fair Isle sweater. Altuzarra is the brand behind this season’s editor-approved design, thanks to a luxurious blend of alpaca wool and cashmere yarn.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Dolce & Gabbana Gemstone Eyeshadow Palette

Add a sophisticated touch of sparkle to her makeup kit with Dolce & Gabbana’s limited-edition palette, which features four shadows perfect for mixing and matching.

Chanel N°5 1.7 fl. oz. Eau de Parfum Body Oil Set

When in doubt, stick to the classics. Chanel’s signature fragrance will forever be a crowd-pleaser. This set includes the perfume as well as the exquisite body oil, so she can double the fragrance’s impact and get the look (and feel) of super hydrated skin.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Saint Laurent Le 5 à 7 Bea Suede Tote Bag

Is it possible for a handbag to be trendy and classic at the same time? Yes. Case in point: this Saint Laurent tote. The timeless silhouette is something she can carry to the office or through the airport. Plus, the brown suede material checks the trendy box.

Flamingo Estate The Mini Garden Tour

When it comes to high-quality gifts for every woman on your list, bookmark Flamingo Estate. This set comes with a little bit of everything, from the slowly harvested olive oil to the soap created with sustainable botanicals.
